comment.author: 27814716@N06
comment._content: Wonderful promo shot - full of 70's chic. Great CTR design with the handle delineating the speaker and the idea of an all-round-sound ... the cassette tapes show up well in the large size... what joy making up those personal compilations - and then there's those three little monkeys in the company logo behind! Check this out for retro uses of CTR - www.designboom.com/contemporary/cassettes.html - or you can still play them and enjoy the sound.
